affiliation.description: The scholarly institution this contributor is employed by or affiliated with.

biography.description: An optional bio statement about this contributor.

fullName.description: The full name of the author. This will be the preferredPublicName or, if that is not available, a string containing the givenName and familyName.

includeInBrowse.description: Whether or not to include this contributor in author lists when the publication appears in search results, tables of content and catalog entries.

orcid.description: The ORCID of this contributor. See: https://orcid.org/

preferredPublicName.description: An optional field for contributors to specify how they prefer to be identified in this publication.

seq.description: The order in which this contributor should appear in a list of contriibutors.

submissionLocale.description: The primary locale of the submission this author is attached to. This locale is used as the fallback when a language is missing from a multilingual property.

url.description: An optional URL to this contributor's webpage.

userGroupId.description: The ID of this contributor's assigned user group. See userGroupName.

userGroupName.description: The name of this contributor's role in the publication, such as 'Author' or 'Translator'.
